text:
Struggles and Triumphs

Dostoevsky, burdened by loss and debt.  
His heart aches with every word.  
Dostoevsky: "I must write faster!"  

---

Mourners gather at his grave, somber.  
A friend: "He deserves a king's farewell."  
Another: "His wisdom will live on."

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Dostoevsky faced immense personal and financial struggles throughout his life, yet his profound insights and literary contributions earned him enduring admiration in Russia.
